name: Switchcraft: Magical Match 3
description:
Enter a world of magic and mystery as you puzzle your way through the world’s top academy of witchcraft, Pendle Hill. The entire campus has been rocked by the disappearance of a popular student. Now it’s up to you to unravel the mystery of a missing young witch, using your magical Match-3 skills...

Match your way through hundreds of enchanting levels to reveal a rich interactive story, where every choice matters! Unlock a beautiful graphic novel, bursting with compelling characters and stories that will hold you under their spell.

Enrol at Pendle Hill Academy, where magical marvels occur every day!


- A MAGICAL MATCH-3 MYSTERY: Puzzle your way through hundreds of levels.
- A COMPELLING INTERACTIVE STORY: Choose your path carefully as secrets are revealed.
- A RICH GRAPHIC NOVEL: Unlock a beautiful graphic novel, bursting with compelling characters.
- A WORLD YOU’LL LOVE: Join the students and faculty of Pendle Hill, make friends, find love and uncover the drama at the world’s #1 academy of witchcraft.


---------------------------------------------------------------

Switchcraft is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play Switchcraft and access its social features. Switchcraft may also contain advertising.
